page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: Operating from a small,centrally lo- cated office, adjacent to the street- lined bus and coach parking areas,the major operators in the area are the Midland Red Buses & the National Exp- ress Coaches.The Midland Red has 10 buses with 10 drivers in the area,off ering regular local services to Here- ford,Gloucester & Newport. Pensioners receive concessionary tickets worthÂ£8 per annum.Under 16s travel 0.66 adult fee. Special tickets exist at Â£1.75/ day anywhere in area.National Express operate to all major cities from the Cheltenham terminal.Traffic volumes have been reduced in the town centre since the construction & opening in Feb'85 of the by-pass.Ross Police Tra nsport details show the busiest days to be market days-Thurs & Sat;with 10 fatal accidents & approx.190 RTA's in l984.The most vulnerable age is 17-18
